titleStmt.title: The tragical end and death of the Lord Iames Regent of Scotland, lately set forth in Scottish, and printed at Edinburgh. 1570. And now partly turned in to English
Regentis tragedie
titleStmt.author: Sempill, Robert, 1530?-1595.

titleStmt.title: The tragical end and death of the Lord Iames Regent of Scotland, lately set forth in Scottish, and printed at Edinburgh. 1570. And now partly turned in to English
Regentis tragedie
titleStmt.author: Sempill, Robert, 1530?-1595.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Awdely, dwelling in litle Britaine strete, without Aldersgate,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Iames Earle of Murray Regent of renowne".
Originally published the same year in Edinburgh as: The regentis tragedie.
"The tragedies lenuoy" is in a single column at right.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
